text: Paul Fisher may refer to: * Paul A. Fisher (1921–2007), American author and journalist * Paul Fisher (cricketer, born 1954) (born 1954), English cricketer and educationalist * Paul Fisher (cricketer, born 1977) (born 1977), English cricketer * Paul C. Fisher (1913–2006), American industrialist and inventor of the Fisher Space Pen * Paul Fisher (fictional), a fictional character in the book Tangerine * Paul Fisher (economist) (born 1958), member of the Bank of England's Monetary Policy Committee * Paul Fisher (agent), model agent * Paul Fisher (footballer) (born 1951), English footballer * Paul Fisher (sailor) (born 1962), Bermudian Olympic sailor ==See also== * Paul Fischer (disambiguation)
title: Paul Fisher
